pages.text: Mana is the raw magical energy of the planes, found condensed into leylines and tapped into the forms you see here. There are 5 basic colors of mana in the universe: White, blue, black, red, and green.$(br2)Mana is generated from the $(l:manatap)Mana Tap$(/l) and used in $(l:spellcasting)spellcasting$(/l), $(l:spellcrafters_desk)spellcrafting$(/l), $(l:artificers_table)artificing$(/l), and many other things.
White is the color of law and order. It is best represented by the sprawling Plains.
Blue is the color of the mind and reason. It is best represented by the remote Islands.
Black is the color of decay and destruction. It is best represented by the eternally rotting Swamps.
Red is the color of passion and upheaval. It is best represented by the awe-inspiring Mountains.
Green is the color of growth and nature. It is best represented by the overgrown Forests.
Colorless mana is a special type of mana that is usable to pay only unaligned mana costs. It is the 'color' of machines and artificing, and occurs most in the mana-barren Deserts.
